name: Custom background for a lot of websites
description:
Add custom backgrounds (by default Hatsune Miku) to these websites:
- YouTube
- Twitter
- Twitch
- DuckDuckGo
- Imgur
- Dailymotion
- Pornhub

I'll add more later as I have time
additional_info:
Important note: it's HIGHLY recommended to change the URIs to a local image, since it's very network-intensive.
